content.rendered:
The AlgoFx Stellar is an advanced Expert Advisor for grid systems built for a long-term goal. It is a fully automated forex robot to reduce stressful trading. EA has proved to be a stellar performer on our Myfxbook record.

Check Myfxbook for a verified track record.

How to install

  • I recommend running the EA on VPS for uninterrupted trading.
  • Attach the EA to the AUDUSD pair in 15 minutes time frame.
  • Best pairs to work with: AUDCAD, AUDNZD, NZDCAD
  • For prop firms like FTMO set files are available. You can attach them.

Strategy

Our Expert Advisor uses an indicator to find out the reversal in the market to open a position. Sometimes the reversal position doesn’t hit the Take profit, so our system uses the Martingale system to recover the positions. This helps in steady income every month.

With a lower setting robot gives a steady 5% to 10% income. In a higher setting, you can expect 20% to 30% returns every month.

Requirements

You must need a good broker and trading conditions. I recommend the two brokers mentioned below and VPS.

ROBOFOREX

Register here: https://roboforex.com/

GET A VPS: VPS is a must to run the EA continuously for the best results

FXVM VPS

The best VPS service we have found so far is FXVM VPS. We utilize a VPS to allow the EA to stay on 24/7! This is very important! FXVM is super-fast, and we have never had any technical problems with them. They also have great support. This is the best VPS service out there in our opinion!
Get VPS here: https://fxvm.net/
